snippet: The musical pulls in almost $2.95 million for nine performances, and ends 2012 as the highest grossing Broadway show for the ninth consecutive year.
abstract: The musical pulls in almost $2.95 million for nine performances, and ends 2012 as the highest grossing Broadway show for the ninth consecutive year.

headline.main: Defying Gravity: 'Wicked' Soars to Broadway Box Office Record
